801. Minimum Swaps To Make Sequence Increasing(使序列递增的最小交换次数)

方法一：Brute Force - DFS(超时)

Time complexity: O(2^n)

Space complexity: O(n)

方法二：DP

use swap[i] / keep[i] to denotes the min swaps to make nums1[0] ~ nums1[i] / nums2[0] ~ nums2[i] strickly increasing with / without swap nums1[i] with nums2[i]
if (nums1[i] > nums1[i - 1] && nums2[i] > nums2[i - 1])
keep[i] = keep[i - 1];
swap[i] = swap[i - 1] + 1;
if (nums1[i] > nums2[i - 1] && nums2[i] > nums1[i - 1])
swap[i] = min(swap[i ], keep[i - 1]+ 1);
keep[i] = min(keep[i], swap[i - 1]);

673. Number of Longest Increasing Subsequence(最长递增子序列的个数)

Related Problem: 300. 最长递增子序列

方法一：记忆化递归

LIS[n - 1] = length of LIS ends whith A[n -1]

LIS[n - 1] = max(LIS’[i] + 1) 0 <= i < n - 1 A[n - 1] > A[i]

ans_lis = max(LIS[i]) 0 <= i <= n - 1

NLIS[n - 1] = number of LIS ends with A[n - 1]

l = LIS[n - 1]

NLIS[n - 1] = sum(NLIS[i]) 0<=i < n-1 A[n - 1] > A[i] LIS[i] == l - 1

ans = sum(NLIS[i]) 0 <= i <= n - 1 LIS[i] == ans_lis

方法二：动态规划

546. Remove Boxes(移除盒子)

Related Problem: 312. Burst Balloons(戳气球)

Naive ideas: Not optimal! Don’t consider the “order”

= max score of subarray ~

base case:

0, if j > i

(j - i + 1) * (j - i + 1), if ~ have the same color

transition:

, i <= k <= j

ans:

Right ideas:

= max score of subarray ~ if there are k boxes that have the same color as following

Those k boxes are from ~ , to simulate boxes with other colors are removed first.

base case:

0, if j < i

transition:

case 1: drop box[j], remove k+1 boxes.

case 2: Try all breakpoints p, attach a[j] to a[p], i <= p < j, box[p] == box[j-1]

we can use two variables to track the max_l and max_r so far
use l, r to track two sides, move l, r based on whether max_l < max_r. if max_l < max_r, answer depends on max_l, so we move l.

87. Scramble String(扰乱字符串)

方法一：记忆化递归

isScramble(s1, s2)
if s1 == s2: return true
if sorted(s1) != sroted(s2): return false
We try all possible partitions:

  1. s1[0 : k] v.s s2[0 : k] && s1[k : L] vs s2[k : L] //分割成两半，当前分割点不做swap
  2. s1[0 : k] vs s2[L- k : L] && s1[k : L] vs s2[0 : L- k] //分割成两半，当前分割点做swap

T(n) = 4n * T(n/2) + O(n) ~ O(nlog(4n))

Time complexity: O(n^5)
Space complexity: O(n^4)

221. Maximal Square(最大正方形)

221Link

方法一：Brute Force

枚举所有的左上角，尝试所有可能的大小

main loop: m * n * min(m,n)

check: O(m * n)

方法二：动态规划

sum(x : x + size, y : y + size) = sum(0 : x + size, 0 : y + size) - sum(0 : x - 1, 0 : y + size) - sum(0 : x + size, 0 : y - 1) + sum(0 : x - 1, 0 : y - 1)

sum(0 : x , 0 : y) = sum(0: x - 1, 0 : y) + sum(0 : x, 0 : y - 1) - sum(0 : x - 1, 0 : y - 1) + matrix(x, y)

方法三：动态规划

= max size can achieve at (x, y) as bottom right

are all 1s

sum(x1 : x2 , y1 : y2) = sum(0 : x2 , 0 : y2) - sum(0 : x1 - 1, 0 : y2) - sum(0 : x2, 0 : y1 - 1 ) + sum(0 : x1 - 1, 0 : y1 - 1)

678. Valid Parenthesis String(有效的括号子字符串)

方法一：Brute Force

对每个*号，尝试三种可能性[(, ), “”]

方法二：动态规划

如果且仅当间隔 s[i], s[i+1], …, s[j] 能组成有效的括号时，为 true。只有在下列情况下， 才为 true：

s[i] 是 ‘*’ 号, 且在 s[i+1], s[i+2], …, s[j] 这个范围能够组成有效的括号
或者，s[i] 为 ‘(‘，并且在 [i+1，j] 中有一些 k，使得 s[k] 为 ‘)’，且(s[i+1:k] 和 s[k+1:j+1])截断的两个间隔可以构成有效的括号；

方法三：贪心算法

min_op, max_op to track the min/max possible open “(“

++min_op if s[i] == ‘(‘ else –min_op

++max_op if s[i] != ‘)’ else –max_op

max_op should be always >= 0 if min_op < 0, reset it to 0 check min_op == 0

730. Count Different Palindromic Subsequences(统计不同回文子序列)

方法一：记忆化递归

case 1: 首尾字符相同，且中间不出现和首尾字符相同的字符

count(“bccb”) = 2 * count(“cc”) + 2

count(“cc”) : c” “cc”

count(“bccb”)： “bcb” “bccb” | “b” “bb”

case 2: 首尾字符相同，且中间出现一个和首尾字符相同的字符

count(“bcbcb”) = 2 * count(“cbc”) + 1

count(“cbc”) : “b” “c” “cbc” “cc”

count(“bcbcb”)：”bbb” “bcb” “bcbcb” “bccb” | “bb” “b”

case 3: 首尾字符相同，且中间出现两个和首尾字符相同的字符

count(“bbcabb”) = 2 * count(“bcab”) - count(“ca”)

“bcb” “bab” “b” “bb” “c” “a”

“bbcbb” “bbabb” “bbb” “bbbb” “bcb” “bcb” | “bb” “b”

case 4: 首尾字符不相同

count(“abccb”) = count(“abcc”) + count(“bccb”) - count(“bcc”)

方法二：动态规划

Let dp(i, j) be the answer for the string T = S[i:j+1] including the empty sequence. The answer is the number of unique characters in T, plus palindromes of the form “a_a”, “b_b”, “c_c”, and “d_d”, where “_” represents zero or more characters.

= count of different palindromic subseq of s[i] ~ s[j] (inclusive)

=

, not in

, , is the first/last pos of in

740. Delete and Earn(删除并获得点)

若选择了 x，所有等于 x 的元素也应一同被选择，以尽可能多地获得点数。所有等于nums[i-1]和nums[i+1]的元素都不能选择

记元素 x 在数组中出现的次数为 c_x，我们可以用一个数组sum 记录数组nums 中所有相同元素之和，即 sum[x]=x⋅c_x. 若选择了x，则可以获取sum[x] 的点数，且无法再选择x−1 和x+1。这与「198. 打家劫舍」是一样的

[3,4,2] -> [0,2,3,4] -> 2 + 4 = 6

[2, 2, 3, 3, 3, 4] -> [0, 4, 9, 4] -> 9

1621. Number of Sets of K Non-Overlapping Line Segments(大小为K的不重叠线段的数目)

transition:

= # of k segments using n points

case 2: skip the n-th point, k segments in 1 ~ n - 1

can use bottom-up + prefix sum to reduce the time complexity from O(n^2k) to O(nk)

transition:

= # of k segments using n points

transition:

方法五：reduction

This problem can be reduced to: given n + k - 1 points, draw k segments without sharing endpoints

Ans = C(n + k - 1， 2 * k) = dp(n + k - 1， 2 * k)

dp(n, k) = dp(n - 1, k) + dp(n - 1, k - 1)

1655. Distribute Repeating Integers(分配不同整数)

给你一个长度为 n 的整数数组 nums ，这个数组中至多有 50 个不同的值。同时你有 m 个顾客的订单 quantity ，其中，整数 quantity[i] 是第 i 位顾客订单的数目。请你判断是否能将 nums 中的整数分配给这些顾客，且满足：

第 i 位顾客恰好有 quantity[i] 个整数。
第 i 位顾客拿到的整数都是相同的。
每位顾客都满足上述两个要求。
如果你可以分配 nums 中的整数满足上面的要求，那么请返回 true ，否则返回 false 。

方法一：DFS

Time complexity: O(|f|^m) |f|是频率数组的元素数

方法一：Bitmask + Subsets

= whether we can satisfy customers represented by mask using the first i numbers

key: assign i-th number to a subset of customers exclusively.

Time complexity: O(3^10 * 50)

1659. Maximize Grid Happiness(最大化网格幸福感)

方法一：Brute Force

Each cell has three states:

  1. Empty
  2. Introvert
  3. Extrovert

Time Complexity: O(3^(mn)) if we have sufficient people

get the i-th bit:

s & (1 << i)

(s >> i) & 1 (s / 2^i) % 2

shift left and set the last bit to b

((s << 1) | b) & (1 << n - 1) (s * 2 + b) % 2^n

we can use a bae-3 int to represent the state of the whole board, however it there will take O(3 ^ (mn))

Since each peaople only affects 4 neighbors, we only need to know up and left, by tracking the last n cells, we can make optimal decision at the curent position. States reduced to O(3^n)

dp(x, y, in, ex, mask) := max score at (x, y) with in and ex left and the state of previous row is mask.

dp(x, y, in, ex, mask) = max(dp(x + 1, y, in, ex, shift_and_set(mask, 0)), delta(in) + dp(x + 1, y, in - 1, ex,shift_and_set(mask, 1))， delta(ex) + dp(x + 1, y, in, ex - 1, shift_and_set(mask, 2)))

# leave it blank # fill with an introvert # fill with an extrovert

Mask is ternary, mask(i) = {0, 1, 2} means {empty, in, ex}, there are at most 3^n = 3^5 = 243 different states.

Total states / Space complexity: O(m * n * 3^n * in * ex) = 5 * 5 * 3^5 * 6 * 6
Space complexity: O(mn3^ninex)

1681. Minimum Incompatibility(最小不兼容性)

1696. Jump Game VI(跳跃游戏VI)

方法一：记忆化递归

Let dp[i] be “the maximum score we can get at position i”. The answer for dp[i] is nums[i] + max{dp[j]} for max(0, i - k) <= j < i . That gives an O(n*k) solution.

dp[0] = nums[0]

Time Complexity : O((n - k) * k)

方法二：动态规划 + 单调队列

max{dp[j]} max(0, i - k) <= j < i ====> find max of a silding window of size k

1713. Minimum Operations to Make a Subsequence(得到子序列的最少操作次数)

一个数组的 子序列 指的是删除原数组的某些元素（可能一个元素都不删除），同时不改变其余元素的相对顺序得到的数组。

方法一：LCS(Longest common subsequence)

ans = len(A) - LCS(A, B)

= LCS of A[0:i] and B[0:j]

方法二：LIS(Longest increasing subsequence)

The original problem is a LCS (Longest common subsequence) problem that can be solved in O(n*m) time.
Since the elements in the target array is unique, we can convert the numbers into indices that helps to reduce the problem to LIS (Longest increasing subsequence) that can be solved in O(mlogn) time.

e.g.
target: [6,4,8,1,3,2] => [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
array: [4,7,6,2,3,8,6,1] => [1,-1, 0, 5, 4, 2, 0, 3] => [1, 0, 5, 4, 2, 3]
and the LIS is [0, 2, 3] => [6, 8, 1], we need to insert the rest of the numbers.
Ans = len(target) – len(LIS)

Time complexity: O(nlogm)
Space complexity: O(m)

1727. Largest Submatrix With Rearrangements(重新排列后的最大矩阵)

方法一：动态规划

= height of consecutive ones of column[j] with row[i] as the base

enumerate each row[i], sort columns by row[i] in descending order

1799. Maximize Score After N Operations(N次操作后的最大分数)

假设我们已经知道了前K组pair的最优解，不会影响对第K+1对的决策，将排列问题转化为组合问题

state: numbers, k-th operation

space complexity(states) : O(n * 2 ^ (2n))

each state, we try all pairs: O((2n) ^ 2)

dp(mask, i) := max score of numbers (represented by a binary mask) at the i-th operations.
ans = dp(1, mask)
base case: dp = 0 if mask == 0
Transition: dp(mask, i) = max(dp(new_mask, i + 1) + i * gcd(nums[m], nums[n]))

Time complexity: O(n^2 * 2^(2n))
Space complexity: O(2^(2n))

1815. Maximum Number of Groups Getting Fresh Donuts(得到新鲜甜甜圈的最多组数)

方法一：

key observation:

  1. if groups have size that are factors of batch size, we can put it in the front and all of them will be happy. And it is optimal.
  2. For groups of size that are larger than batch size, we can use n % k as the new group size which will not affect the final results.

Enumerate all possible arrangements to find optimal ones.

Time complexity: O(n!)

Assuming we already know the optimal sequence of the first k groups, the order of the prior sequence not affect the decision of the k+1 group since the sum is fixed. Thus we can convert it to a combination problem.

Time complexity: O(n * 2^n)

the key is the small batch size(k <= 9), using n % k, we have at most 8 diffenent group sizes

this could significantly reduce the state space(deduplication).

state: a counter, {group_size:count}

best case: all groups fall into the same bin -> states: {x:n}, {x:n - 1},……,{x:1}, n in total

worst case: every distribution? each bin has n / k groups States: (n/k)^k

Time complexity: O(n * (n / k)^k)

Let denote the max score diff that current player can achieve by taking (or equivalent)

// Alice takes all the stones.
// Alice takes n-1 stones, Bob take the last one (A[n-1]) + put-back-stone.
// Alice takes n-2 stones, Bob has two options (takes n-1 stones or takes n stones)
…
// Alice takes the first stone, Bob has n-1 options.

Time complexity: O(n)
Space complexity: O(1)

1531. (压缩字符串II)

方法一：动态规划

state:
i - current index; k - # of chars to remove; p : previous character; l - running length of the last character
dp(state) = min len of s[i : ] encoded, given the current state
Transition for dp(i, k, p, l)
delete = dp(i + 1, k - 1, p, l)
keep = if (s[i] == p): carry + dp[i + 1, k, p, l + 1] else 1 + dp[i + 1, k, s[i], 1]
Time Complexity: O(n * n * k * 26)

方法二：动态规划 + 状态压缩

we need last/running length because the unsolved subproblem rely on that.
what if we remove the depency by making once group of same characters at a time?
dp[i, k] = min length to encode s[i:] with at most k deletions
Transition: keep/delete
delete: dp[i, k] = dp[i + 1, k - 1]
keep: use s[i] as an anchor, scan from i to n, for s[i ~ j], we need to remove all other characters other than s[i] to form a group
dp[i, k] = encode_len(sum(s[ij] == s[i])) + dp[j + 1, k - (s[ij] != s[i])]
Time Complexity: O(n * k * n)

1449. Form Largest Integer With Digits That Add up to Target(数位成本和为目标值的最大数字)

方法一：动态规划

dp[t] = max number that costs t
dp[t] = max(d + dp[t - cost[d]]) or “0”
dp[t] = “0” if t < 0, invalid
dp[t] = “” if t == 0
ans = dp[target]
Time complexity: O(target^2)
Space complexity: O(target^2)

方法二：动态规划 + 优化

To avoid string copying, we can store digit added (in order to back track the parent) and length of the optimal string.

Time complexity: O(target)
Space complexity: O(target)

1444. Number of Ways of Cutting a Pizza(切披萨的方案数)

方法一：动态规划

dp(m, n, k) := # of ways to cut with k cuts.
dp(m, n, k) = sum(hasApples(top) * dp(bottom,k – 1)) + sum(hasApples(left) * dp(right, k – 1))
dp(m, n, k) = sum(hasApples(m, n, x, N - 1) * dp(x, n, k – 1) for x in range(m, M)) + sum(hasApples(m, n, M - 1, y) * dp(y + 1, m, k – 1) for y in range(n, N))

Time complexity: O(M * N * (M+N) * K) = O(N^3 * K)
Space complexity: O(MNK)

1425. Constrained Subset Sum(带限制的子序列和)

dp[i] := max sum of a subset that include nums[i]
dp[i] := max(dp[i-1], dp[i-2], …, dp[i-k-1], 0) + nums[i]
Time Complexity:
Brute Force : O(n * k)
Binary Tree: O(n * logk)
Monotonic queue: O(n)

1416. Restore The Array(恢复数组)

1320. Minimum Distance to Type a Word Using Two Fingers(二指输入的最小距离)

方法一：动态规划

once the best solution is found for word[0~i], it doesn’t matter how we typed it, only the last positions(chars) of the two fingers matter.
state:(i, l, r)
dp(i, l, r) = min cost to type word[i:n] given the position of l/r fingers
c = word[i]
dp(i, l, r) = min(dp(i + 1, c, r) + cost(l, c), dp(i + 1, l , c) + cost(r,c))
ans = dp(0, &, &)
Time complexity: O(n * 27 * 27)

1292. Max Length of a Square with Sum Less than or Equal to Threshold(元素和小于等于阈值的正方形的最大边长)

Precompute the sums of sub-matrixes whose left-top corner is at (0,0).

Try all possible left-top corner and sizes.

Time complexity: O(mnmin(m,n))
Space complexity: O(m*n)



Try all possible corner:

  1. try all possible sizes

    Time complexity: O(m * n * min(m,n))

  2. Binary search
    find the smallest k that sum > threshold

    Time complexity: O(m * n * log(min(m,n)))

  3. Bounded search

    start from the largest size + 1, since smaller ones won’t help

    Time complexity:O(m * n * min(m, n))

方法一：DP + Brute Force

方法二：DP + Binary Search

方法三：DP + Bounded Search

1043. Partition Array for Maximum Sum(分割数组以得到最大和)

方法一：动态规划

ans: dp[n]

975. Odd Even Jump(奇偶跳)

给定一个整数数组A，你可以从某一起始索引出发，跳跃一定次数。在你跳跃的过程中，第1、3、5…次跳跃称为奇数跳跃，而第 2、4、6…次跳跃称为偶数跳跃。

你可以按以下方式从索引i向后跳转到索引j（其中 i < j）：

在进行奇数跳跃时（如，第 1，3，5…次跳跃），你将会跳到索引 j，使得 A[i] <= A[j]，A[j]是可能的最小值。如果存在多个这样的索引j，你只能跳到满足要求的最小索引 j 上。
在进行偶数跳跃时（如，第 2，4，6…次跳跃），你将会跳到索引 j，使得A[i] >= A[j]，A[j]是可能的最大值。如果存在多个这样的索引j，你只能跳到满足要求的最小索引 j 上。
（对于某些索引 i，可能无法进行合乎要求的跳跃。）
如果从某一索引开始跳跃一定次数（可能是 0次或多次），就可以到达数组的末尾（索引 A.length - 1），那么该索引就会被认为是好的起始索引。

返回好的起始索引的数量。

方法一：Brute Force

Simulate the deterministic jumping process, each element O(n)

方法二：DP + Binary Search

Odd jump: find the smallest value greater than self(up)
Even jump: find the largest value less than self(down)
map<int,int> -> min index of the given value
= can reach end starting with a up jump
= can reach end starting with a down jump
Start from the (n - 2)th element
find a valid up jump index j(lower_bound)
find a valid down jump index k(prev(upper_bound))


956. Tallest Billboard(最高的广告牌)

方法一：动态规划

如果直接暴力搜索的话时间复杂度是O(3^N)，超时。
对于每一根可以选择1、放到左边，2、放到右边，3、不使用。最后再看一下左边和右边是否相同。
由于每根柱子只能使用一次（想到01背包），但是怎么去描述放到左边还是放到右边呢？
Naive的方法是用dp[i]表示使用前i个柱子能够构成的柱子高度的集合。

e.g. dp[i] = {(h1, h2)}, h1 <= h2
和暴力搜索比起来DP已经对状态进行了压缩，并不需要关心h1,h2是通过哪些柱子构成了，只关心它们的当前高度。
然后可以选择
1、不用第i根柱子
2、放到低的那一堆
3、放到高的那一堆
状态转移的伪代码：
for h1, h2 in dp[i – 1]:
dp[i] += (h1, h2) # not used
dp[i] += (h1, h2 + h) # put on higher
if h1 + h < h2:
dp[i] += (h1 + h, h2) # put on lower
else:
dp[i] += (h2, h1 + h) # put on lower
假设 rods=[1,1,2]
dp[0] = {(0,0)}
dp[1] = {(0,0), (0,1)}
dp[2] = {(0,0), (0,1), (0,2), (1,1)}
dp[3] = {(0,0), (0,1), (0,2), (0,3), (0,4), (1,1), (1,2), (1,3), (2,2)}
但是dp[i]这个集合的大小可能达到sum^2，所以还是会超时
时间复杂度 O(nsum^2)
空间复杂度 O(nsum^2) 可降维至 O(sum^2)
通过观察发现，若有2个pairs：
(h1, h2), (h3, h4),
h1 <= h2, h3 <= h4, h1 < h3, h2 – h1 = h4 – h3 即高度差相同
如果 min(h1, h2) < min(h3, h4) 那么(h1, h2) 不可能产生最优解，直接舍弃。
因为如果后面的柱子可以构成 h4 – h3/h2 – h1 填补高度差，使得两根柱子一样高，那么答案就是 h2 和 h4。但h2 < h4，所以最优解只能来自后者。
举个例子：有(1, 3)和(2, 4)两个pairs，它们的高度差都是2，假设还有一个长度为2的柱子，那么可以构成(1+2, 3)以及(2+2, 4)，虽然这两个都是解。但是后者的高度要大于前者，所以前者无法构成最优解，也就没必要存下来。
所以，可以把状态压缩到高度差，对于相同的高度差，只存h1最大的。

用dp[i][j]来表示使用前i个柱子，高度差为j的情况下最大的公共高度h1是多少。
状态转移
dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i – 1][j])
dp[i][j+h] = max(dp[i][j + h], dp[i – 1][j])
dp[i][|j-h|] = max(dp[i][|j-h|], dp[i – 1][j] + min(j, h))

方法二：动态规划(hashmap降维)

935. Knight Dialer(骑士拨号器)

方法一：动态规划

= number of ways to move to (i, j) after k steps
except (3,0)(3,2)
transition: for all (i’,j’) can move to (i,j)

Time complexity:O(kmn) or O(k * 12 * 8) = O(k)
Space complexity: O(kmn) -> O(mn) or O(12*8) = O(1)

926. Flip String to Monotone Increasing(将字符串翻转到单调递增)

方法一：Brute Force

枚举每个index作为分割点，分割点前面变为0，后面变为1

方法二：DP prefix + suffix

= # of min flips -> S[0] ~ S[i] all 0s
= # of min flips -> S[i] ~ S[n -1] all 1s
ans = min{l[i] + r[i + 1],l[n - 1], r[0]}
l[i] = l[i - 1] + s[i] == 1
r[i] = r[i + 1] + s[i] == 0

方法三：动态规划

901. Online Stock Span

方法一：DP

dp[i] = span of price[i]

j = i - 1

while price[i] > pice[j]:

​ dp[i] = dp[i] + dp[j]

​ j = j - dp[j]

方法二：单调栈

Maintain a monotonic stack whose element are pairs of <price, span>, sorted by price from high to low.

When a new price comes in

  1. If it’s less than top price, add a new pair (price, 1) to the stack, return 1
  2. If it’s greater than top element, collapse the stack and accumulate the span until the top price is higher than the new price. return the total span

Time complexity: O(1) amortized, each element will be pushed on to stack once, and pop at most once.

Space complexity: O(n), in the worst case, the prices is in descending order.

873. Length of Longest Fibonacci Subsequence(最长的斐波那契子数列的长度)

= max len of seq ends with A[i], A[j].

all to 2 (invalid)

condition: 1 < j < k, A[i] + A[j] = A[k]

check: A[k] - A[j] in A in O(1)

ans : max() (0 <= i < j < n)
